titles.title: A resolution providing for the disposition of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 5026) making dire emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year 1988.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-877.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Motion to Consider H.Res. 524 Agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote: 274-52 (Roll No. 289).
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Makes it in order to take from the Speaker's table H.R. 5026 (emergency supplemental appropriations), with Senate amendments thereto, and to consider a motion disposing of such amendments.
